MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:14am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:31am on Tuesday, 23 March 2021
